annotations.description: Today we tackle one of the most popular Tiki Cocktails in the Cannon: The Mai Tai! The Mai Tai was purportedly created by Victor "Trader Vic" Bergeron in 194...
annotations.title: Tiki Cocktail: Mai Tai

textContent:
2oz or 60ml Aged Jamaican Rum
.75oz or 20ml Orange Curacao
1oz or 30ml Lime Juice
.5oz or 15ml Orgeat
Lime Wheel and Mint Sprig Garnish

Whipshake, pour, and top with crushed ice. 
Garish with lime wheel and mint. 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vTqNLJG2ExE

---

- 1 oz or 30 ml of Jamaican Rum
- 1 oz or 30 ml of Rhum Agricole
- .5 oz or 15 ml of Dry Cura√ßao 
- .5 oz or 15 ml of Orgeat
- .25 oz or 7 ml of Rock Candy Syrup (enriched simple) 
- 1 oz or 30 ml of Lime Juice

- Shake 
- Serve over Crushed Ice
- Garnish with a Sprig of Mint

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QIQvyNmULV0
title: Mai Tai
